dict.acceptation: 含义；含蓄，含意，言外之意；卷入，牵连，牵涉，纠缠；[逻辑学]蕴涵，蕴含；

sent.orig: Both direct implication and indirect implication methods are used in this algorithm.
sent.trans: 算法利用直接蕴含和间接蕴含的方法，解决了布尔可满足问题。

sent.orig: Implication tautology is not reasoning form.
sent.trans: 蕴涵重言式不是推理式。

sent.orig: The implication seems to be we can not have a holiday this year .
sent.trans: 其含意似乎是我们今年不能休假了。

sent.orig: I thought the implication was that they were splitting up.
sent.trans: 我想这潜在的意思就是他们分手了。

sent.orig: Both direct attack and attack by implication hurt others' feelings.
sent.trans: 直截了当的攻击和含沙射影的攻击都很伤人。
